modName: The Lord of The Scrolls -Bane of Kings-
summary:
One of many projects aimed at bringing LoTR into Skyrim.
-Compilations are desired-
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://a3.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/380944_302332229798593_100000654548788_1000271_2006865905_n.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][i]I amar prestar aen, han mathon ne nen, han mathon ne chae a han noston ned \'wilith[/i][/center] 
[center]
-The world is changed; I can feel it in the water, I can feel it in the earth, I can smell it in the air.-[/center]


The Elder Scrolls storyline & universe are epic, as is The Lord of The Rings. While they both share numerous similarities, they are also quite different in many ways.

Some decisions/choices have been generally decided upon, but we\'d still LOVE the community\'s input as to the finer aspects of each.  Below is a list of some of those & we truly hope you agree and/or will post idea\'s....

==Update==

-Mod work Temp Suspended-

Bethesda CK Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aBUqMcXeiCk&feature=share

Due to the imminent release of the CK which we now know is the most powerful modding tool ever made....  Almost everything has to broken down and restructured.

However don\'t worry, our goal remains the same....  To preserve the essence of both stories if we can.  But the CK will make almost anything possible which means alot of good things & alot of new decisions. 

In addition, We will try and release small various \"packs\" of changes that where still in WIP.  But ultimately its back too the drawing board, but in such a good exciting way.

Currently we are so very proud to announce the inclusion of Several wonderful mods & would like to thoroughly thank their Authors for the wonderful work & inclusion into our LoTR project!!

[center][b]\"Gandalf The White Character, Robes & Staff Port\" By TheWhiteRider

\"Middle Earth Shields\" By Haldir307

\"Anduril-Flame of The West\" By DigitalLion

\"Wizard\'s Hat\" By DigitalLion

\"Fantasy Weapons\" By DigitalLion

\"Extended Slider Colors\" By Expired

\"Glowy rune and effect\" By devilwithin

\"Horse Whistle - Running Horse\" By DarkenDE  (Whistle alt. to Gandalf sfx)

\"Phenderix Magic Evolved - 152 New Spells\" By phenderix

\"Midas Magic\" By xilver

\"Aeterna\'s Circlets\" By Aeterna

\"Ringwraith Greatsword\" by mandarinn

\"Gondorian Bracers\"  By  Bucklar

\"Dragons Made More Unique\"  By Busted 11290

\"Ring of Shadows\" By Nickoli002

\"Custom LoTR/Skyrim Main Menu\" By Helltorm102 (TY so much!)

\"Cool Items Pack/Uber Item Chest\" By Chachanshen (Heavily altered to include the LoTR gear) 

\"Overlook Tower\" By SLuckyD[/b][/center]

If you feel like adding your work or trying to help out just send me a message and we\'ll figure it out, or at least feed you to the Horkers.... =P 

[center][b]Current Team:

TheWhiteRider: Lead/Concept/Art
DigitalLion: Models/Textures/Import&Export/Art
SamWiseGamGee: Public Relations/Permissions/Concepts
RangerOfTheAbyss: Master LoreMaster
FaramirTheBrute: Sounds
Devilwithin: Textures/Glows/Weapon Enhancements
Monster_Hunter: Storyboard/Lore
Hellstorm102: Main Menu
SLuckyD: Landscaping/Architecture
Haldir307: Art/Texturing[/b][/center]
author: TheWhiteRider
